name: Project MMSR
description:
Defeat enemies and collect coins to gain experience to level up.

Controls - Menu

Use WASD or arrow keys to navigate the menu. Press space to confirm selection.

Controls - Gameplay

WASD / Arrowkeys - Movement

Z - Attack

X - Midair Roll

Space - Jump

Esc - Return to main menu

M - Mute sounds

Press Jump while crouching to pass through platforms
